section_title: 22a01. Effective date of revised exemption tests.
text:
The
effective date of the revised exemption tests under 29 CFR part 541 is
08/23/2004.  The revised regulations were published in the Federal Register on
04/23/2004 (69 FR 22122).   69
FR 22122
html:
The effective date of the revised exemption tests under 29 CFR part 541 is 08/23/2004.  The revised regulations were published in the Federal Register on 04/23/2004 (69 FR 22122).
